name: protocol-buffers-schema-ts
description: No nonsense protocol buffers schema parser written in Typescript

scripts.build: [ -d lib ] && rm -r lib; [ -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo ] && rm tsconfig.tsbuildinfo; mkdir -p lib && tsc && for i in lib/*.js; do sed -e 's/from "\(.\/[a-z-]*\)"/from "\1.mjs"/g' -e "s/from '\(.\/[a-z-]*\)'/from '\1.mjs'/g" -i "$i" && mv "$i" "lib/$(basename "$i" .js).mjs" && echo "did ${i} -> lib/$(basename "$i" .js).mjs"; done && tsc -m commonjs
scripts.build-test: npm run build && npm run test

author: zeen3
